Overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokemon's HP is low.

Blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokemon's HP is low.

Torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokemon's HP is low.

Static.description: The Pokemon may cause paralysis when it's hit by a physical move.

Shadow Boost.description: Increases the power of Shadow moves by 50%.
